article.headline: (5) OLD DOMINION 79, (4) COLORADO 61
article.story: BOULDER, Colo. (AP) -- Richard Roby scored 15 points and the University of Colorado easily handled Regis 73-37 in an exhibition Tuesday night thanks to a strong second half. The Buffaloes shot just 31 percent in the first half and led 22-16 at the break before shooting 62 percent in the second half and running away with it. Xavier Silas added 12 points for the Buffs, Marcus King-Stockton had 10 points and Dominique Coleman had a double-double with 10 points and 10 rebounds. Ohio State transfer Jermyl Jackson-Wilson added 10 rebounds. Brandon Butler led Regis with 10 points. The Buffs open the season Friday night against Denver.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
